professional_profile: I'm Max, an organized, creative and solution oriented Python software developer. I believe that the optimization and automation of processes is the key to an efficient business.

I first started out as a linguist but quickly became attracted to the world of programming languages. My previous work experiences in a variety of different sectors (CSO, Project Management, Data Cleansing) helped me acquire good adaptation skills and an analytical mindset.
Also, I'm very keen on learning and I love to undertake challenging custom projects.
whoami: Let's get a little more personal.
I am a musician - playing bass-guitar and singing. I have had multiple bands for which I composed original songs.
Rock-climbing is my favorite sports and I climb at least once a week.
Finally, I am also a rolist. In other words, I play tabletop RPGs with friends both as a GM and as a player.
